rules_text: When Astrid, Disgruntled Princess enters, destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of Warriors you control.
flavor_text: [i]“Saffrisa's conquest will raze this world and let Skhorvall starve in the ashes. Either she dies, or we do.”[/i]
notes: “Saffrisa's forsaken what it means to be Skhorvall. You who would still live our strength, come and crush her with me.”
